amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for the prosecution of enemy combatants in Article III courts of the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 753 proposed by Senator Ayotte to Amendment SA 738.
Amendment SA 753 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 186.
